intro.title: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
intro.content: At IPCSolder, we value and respect your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services or communicate with us.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect only the information necessary to provide you with the best possible service:
items: Contact information: name, email, phone, and company
Professional information: position, industry, and location
Inquiries and messages you send us through forms
Basic browser technical information to improve our website

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.intro: We use your information exclusively to:
items: Respond to your inquiries and provide technical support
Send you information about relevant products and services
Comply with legal and commercial obligations

dataProtection.title: Protection of Your Data
dataProtection.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your data is stored on secure servers and only authorized personnel have access to it.

noSale.title: üîí We Don't Sell Your Information
noSale.content: We NEVER sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for commercial purposes. Your data is confidential and is used solely to provide you with our services.

userRights.title: Your Rights
items: Access the personal information we have about you
Request deletion of your personal data
Withdraw your consent at any time
File a complaint with competent authorities

contact.title: Contact for Privacy Matters
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, contact us:

hero.title: Contact
hero.subtitle: How can we help you solve your problem?
hero.description: Contact us for a free assessment of your production line. Our experts are ready to help you improve and optimize your processes.

info.title: Let's Talk!
info.description: Our experts are ready to review your production line and offer you specific solutions. We prefer a complete form to better understand your situation and provide you with the most accurate response.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: We are the experts!
hero.description: Over 20 years of combined experience in the electronics industry. We know what the market needs and we know how to solve your problems.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: IPCSolder was born from the need to offer real solutions to the electronics industry. After years working in the sector, we identified that many companies send salespeople without real technical experience.
history.paragraph2: We are different. Each member of our team is an expert with over 20 years of experience in their specific area. We are not just salespeople, we are engineers who know the processes from the inside.
history.paragraph3: Our approach is simple: understand your problem and give you the right solution. We don't sell products, we sell solutions that work.
history.imageDescription: Specialized in maquiladoras, original manufacturers and electronic contract manufacturing

mission.sectionDescription: What motivates us and guides us in every decision we make

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To be a strategic and reliable partner for the electronics industry, offering innovative solutions in soldering and manufacturing supplies, with a focus on the customer, quality, efficiency, and continuous staff training.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To consolidate ourselves as the most advanced and reliable partner for electronic manufacturing solutions, recognized for our ability to offer high-value comprehensive services, with innovation, technical support, and excellence in every project. We adapt to the changing needs of the market, driving the growth and competitiveness of our clients.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: At IPCSolder, we are guided by principles that inspire the way we work, make decisions, and relate to our clients, partners, and collaborators. These values are the foundation of our commitment to excellence.
values.description2: Together, these values are the essence of IPCSolder: working with vision, acting with audacity, and remaining firm with perseverance to drive our clients' growth.

experience.title: Integrity
experience.description: we act with transparency in every project.

solutions.title: Customer Commitment
solutions.description: we work to exceed their expectations.

commitment.title: Honesty
commitment.description: we build relationships based on trust.

working.title: Teamwork
working.description: we collaborate to achieve the best results.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: we take on every challenge with discipline, ethics, and professionalism.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: We think about the future to anticipate trends and opportunities in the electronics industry. Our vision guides us to create innovative and sustainable solutions that generate value and keep our clients at the forefront.

audacity.title: Audacity
audacity.description: We believe in the courage to face challenges and explore new ideas. Audacity drives us to go beyond the conventional, to make firm decisions, and to open paths that strengthen our clients' competitiveness.

perseverance.title: Perseverance
perseverance.description: Constancy and discipline characterize us. Perseverance allows us to overcome obstacles, stay focused on objectives, and advance with determination until we achieve outstanding results.

differentiators.title: What makes us different?
differentiators.description: At IPCSolder, we don't send salespeople; we send engineers. Our team is composed of specialists who know the electronics industry firsthand, with real experience on the production floor.
differentiators.description2: This allows us to precisely understand your challenges, requirements, and needs. More than a supplier, we become your strategic ally, contributing technical knowledge and practical solutions that generate results.
differentiators.description3: Our mission is to help you improve your production and boost your processes, reducing defects, optimizing tools, and ensuring that every project meets the highest standards of quality and efficiency.
differentiators.description4: With IPCSolder, you get more than a product: you receive specialized technical support, proven experience, and a commitment to your success.

team.sectionDescription: Each specialist has over 20 years of experience in their specific area. They are "old sea wolves" who know exactly what the industry needs.

cta.description: Contact us for a free consultation. We help you identify improvement opportunities in your electronic manufacturing process.

hero.title: Our Products
hero.subtitle: Electronics Assembly Solutions
hero.description: Six specialized divisions with high-quality products for all electronic industry needs. Each category has dedicated experts.

mro.title: MRO
mro.description: Maintenance, Repair and Operations. Essential products for optimal operation of SMT lines and electronic manufacturing equipment.

esd.title: ESD
esd.description: Electrostatic Protection. Specialized products to prevent electrostatic discharge damage to sensitive components.

solder.title: SOLDER PRODUCTS
solder.description: High-quality soldering products including bars, wires, liquid flux and preforms for all electronic manufacturing applications.

machines.title: MACHINES
machines.description: Specialized services for SMT equipment including spare parts, preventive maintenance, repairs and specialized technical support.

laser.title: LASER
laser.description: Specialized precision laser cutting, laser engraving and inspection template services for industrial and electronic applications.

tooling.title: TOOLING
tooling.description: Specialized tools including squeegees, PCB holders, router plates, pallets and custom fixtures for SMT lines.

thermocouples.title: Type K Thermocouples
thermocouples.subtitle: Precision temperature measurement
thermocouples.description: High-precision thermocouples available in different lengths with PFA insulation and glass braid for temperatures up to 480¬∞C.

pallets.title: Pallets
pallets.subtitle: PCB transport
pallets.description: Specialized pallets for safe transport of PCBs through production lines with precise positioning.

fixtures.title: Specialized Fixtures
fixtures.subtitle: Custom solutions
fixtures.description: Specialized fixtures and bases for specific applications including rotary bases, screwing systems and custom configurations.

redGlue.title: NE8800T Red Glue
redGlue.subtitle: Chip Bonder adhesive
redGlue.description: Specialized adhesive for SMD component fixation before soldering process. Excellent adhesion and thermal resistance.

ipa.title: Isopropyl Alcohol (IPA)
ipa.subtitle: PCB and component cleaning
ipa.description: High purity isopropyl alcohol for cleaning PCBs, electronic components and manufacturing equipment.

nozzleCleaner.title: F37 Gel Nozzle Cleaner
nozzleCleaner.subtitle: Gel nozzle cleaner
nozzleCleaner.description: Specialized gel cleaner for dispensing nozzles and solder paste application. Non-aggressive formula.

routerBits.title: Router Bits
routerBits.subtitle: Specialized PCB bits
routerBits.description: High precision bits for PCB cutting and drilling. Available in different diameters and geometries.

traysAndBins.title: Trays and Bins ESD Safe
traysAndBins.subtitle: Antistatic trays and containers
traysAndBins.description: Trays and containers specifically designed for safe handling of electrostatic discharge sensitive components.

evaSheets.title: Conductive EVA Sheets
evaSheets.subtitle: Conductive EVA sheets
evaSheets.description: Conductive EVA sheets to create antistatic work surfaces and protect sensitive components during handling.

solderBars.title: Solder Bars
solderBars.subtitle: High-quality alloys
solderBars.description: Solder bars in SAC305, SAC387 and other specialized alloy formulations for electronic manufacturing applications.

solderWire.title: Solder Wire
solderWire.subtitle: For manual and automatic soldering
solderWire.description: Solder wire with incorporated flux in different diameters and alloys for manual soldering and automated processes.

liquidFlux.title: Liquid Flux
liquidFlux.subtitle: Soldering activators
liquidFlux.description: Liquid flux of different activities (RMA, RA, OA) to improve wettability and reduce defects in soldering processes.

preforms.title: Solder Preforms
preforms.subtitle: Predefined shapes
preforms.description: Solder preforms in different geometries and alloys for specific electronic assembly applications.

spareParts.title: SMT Spare Parts
spareParts.subtitle: Original and compatible parts
spareParts.description: Original and compatible spare parts for SMT equipment from major brands including Panasonic, Fuji, Yamaha and JUKI.

maintenance.title: Preventive Maintenance
maintenance.subtitle: Maintenance programs
maintenance.description: Preventive maintenance programs designed to maximize uptime and extend the life of SMT equipment.

repair.title: Repair Service
repair.subtitle: Specialized repairs
repair.description: Specialized repair service for SMT equipment with advanced diagnostics and on-site or workshop repairs.

support.title: Technical Support
support.subtitle: Specialized assistance
support.description: Specialized technical support for process optimization, problem solving and personnel training.

precisionCutting.title: Precision Cutting
precisionCutting.subtitle: Specialized laser cutting
precisionCutting.description: High-precision laser cutting services for electronic materials, solder stencils and specialized components.

laserEngraving.title: Laser Engraving
laserEngraving.subtitle: Marking and engraving
laserEngraving.description: Laser engraving services for component marking, traceability and customization of electronic products.

inspectionTemplates.title: Inspection Templates
inspectionTemplates.subtitle: Specialized templates
inspectionTemplates.description: Laser-cut inspection templates for quality control and component verification on SMT lines.

squeegees.title: Squeegees
squeegees.subtitle: Application tools
squeegees.description: Squeegees of different materials and hardnesses for optimal solder paste application in screen printing processes.

cardHolders.title: Card Holders
cardHolders.subtitle: PCB support
cardHolders.description: Specialized clamping systems for PCBs during manufacturing, inspection and repair processes.

routerPlates.title: Router Plates
routerPlates.subtitle: Specialized cutting bases
routerPlates.description: Specialized plates for CNC routers with clamping and positioning systems for precise PCB cutting.

palletsFixtures.title: Pallets and Fixtures
palletsFixtures.subtitle: Custom solutions
palletsFixtures.description: Custom pallets and fixtures for specific electronic manufacturing applications and automated processes.

cta.title: Need a specific solution?
cta.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you find the perfect product for your application. Contact us for a personalized consultation.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: How can we help you improve?
hero.description: Specialized technical support and consulting to improve your production, reduce defects and optimize processes with over 20 years of experience.

valueProp.title: What makes us different?
valueProp.paragraph1: While other companies send salespeople without technical experience, we send engineers with over 20 years in the electronics industry.
valueProp.paragraph2: We don't sell products, we solve problems. We get into the process, review your line and tell you exactly where you are failing and how to improve it.
valueProp.paragraph3: Our approach is simple: we take away a problem, make it work for you, and then comes the commercial side with fast attention and appropriate sales plan.

assessmentCard.title: Free Assessment
assessmentCard.description: We review your line at no cost and tell you where to improve

servicesSection.title: Specialized Services
servicesSection.description: Technical support and consulting with direct collaboration to achieve personalized solutions

assessment.title: Line Assessment
assessment.description: Complete audit of your manufacturing process at no cost. We identify problems and improvement opportunities.

consulting.title: Process Consulting
consulting.description: Process optimization with specific recommendations to increase production, reduce costs and improve yield.

support.title: Specialized Technical Support
support.description: Technical support with expert engineers who know equipment from the inside and can solve complex problems.

documentation.title: Technical Sheets and Documentation
documentation.description: Access to detailed technical sheets, specifications and specialized documentation upon request.

fieldServices.title: Field Services
fieldServices.description: Specialized services directly at your plant with experts who get involved in your process until achieving results.

analysis.title: Analysis and Reports
analysis.description: Detailed analysis of your production line with technical reports and recommendations based on real data.

process.title: Our Work Process
process.description: A systematic approach to guarantee real results in your production line

steps.title: Initial Contact
steps.description: You contact us with your specific problem. We understand your situation and schedule a visit.

steps.title: Free Assessment
steps.description: We review your line at no cost. We identify problems and improvement opportunities.

steps.title: Report and Recommendations
steps.description: We deliver a detailed report with specific recommendations and action plan.

steps.title: Implementation
steps.description: We implement solutions working directly on your production line.

steps.title: Follow-up
steps.description: We follow up to ensure improvements are maintained and continuously optimize.

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.description: Specialized experience in different sectors of the electronics industry

list.title: Consumer Electronics
list.description: Mobile devices, tablets, wearables and mass consumer products.

list.title: Automotive
list.description: Electronic components for automotive industry and electric vehicles.

list.title: Maquiladoras
list.description: Contract manufacturing plants with high production volumes.

list.title: Communications
list.description: Telecommunications equipment, networking and communications infrastructure.

list.title: Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEM)
list.description: Companies that design and manufacture their own electronic products.

list.title: Medical Equipment
list.description: Medical devices and diagnostic equipment with critical standards.
